column4: Problem. I get home, switch my workspace to the one I use, computer locks up. I get into tty1, do a ps aux, nothing seems out of the ordinary. I restart X. It loads, I can do stuff. I have no background icons, alt+click isn't moving stuff, ALT+F2 isn't opening my run  box, etc etc
how do you get it back?
when it's working, do ps aux (saving the output)
then do the same when it's borked
